Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hot Rod quickly left, running out of the base, and transforming to car mode=
. He headed for the battle at maximum speed.

{Talos & Grimlock}

    The m=
ammoth and robotic t-rex hadn't gotten too far yet, both their alternate fo=
rms built to be rather hardy and strong, not overly quick. It wasn't any bi=
g suprise to see the dust cloud that heralded Hot Rod's movements gaining o=
n them. Focusing on the sight ahead Talos hoped Sunhawk had at least taken =
a few bots to keep Megatron busy.

{Nightshade}

    The fem bot sat back o=
n her bunk estimating Hot Rod's old quickness and the layout of the maximal=
 ship. Once she was sure he had enough time to exit the ship she extended h=
er arm, flipping up a part of her wrist exposing a small series of tools. M=
oving to the door she began working the seal to free herself from her quart=
ers. Sorry Hot Rod, she thought, I had your ideals once and could trust in =
others good side...but that was a long time ago.

    Shaking her head Nigh=
tshade  grimaced picking the magnetic seal on the door quietly...
